<SectionDefinition>

## Public Member Attributes

### HasNoAbnormalExits {#a8f9b5fbbce299553f04afefb3c6847f9}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::ScalarEvolution::LoopProperties::HasNoAbnormalExits">
Set to true if the loop contains no instruction that can abnormally exit the loop (i.e.

via throwing an exception, by terminating the thread cleanly or by infinite looping in a called function). Strictly speaking, the last one is not leaving the loop, but is identical to leaving the loop for reasoning about undefined behavior.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/scalarevolution-h/#l01684">1684</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/scalarevolution-h">ScalarEvolution.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### HasNoSideEffects {#a043b147a681ad63fd2f38c233ee0c114}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::ScalarEvolution::LoopProperties::HasNoSideEffects">
Set to true if the loop contains no instruction that can have side effects (i.e.

via throwing an exception, volatile or atomic access).

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/scalarevolution-h/#l01688">1688</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/scalarevolution-h">ScalarEvolution.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
